variable.name: RADIATIONDOSAGE
variable.description: Total dose of radiation therapy administered, expressed as a dosage amount

variable.name: NUMFRACTIONS
variable.description: Total number of radiation therapy sessions (fractions) which the patient completed to receive the required radiation dose to primary treatment fields

variable.name: RADIATIONTYPE
variable.description: Classification for the form of radiation therapy administered to a subject

variable.name: RADIATIONTREATMENTONGOING
variable.description: Signifies if a subject is still receiving radiation therapy

variable.name: UNITS
variable.description: A unit of measurement corresponding to a dose of radiation therapy given to a subject

variable.name: DAYSTORADIATIONTREATMENTSTART
variable.description: Days elapsed from date of initial diagnosis to start of radiation treatment

variable.name: BCRRADIATIONBARCODE
variable.description: Unique identifier for a subject radiation treatment

variable.name: DAYSTORADIATIONTREATMENTEND
variable.description: Days elapsed from date of initial diagnosis to end of radiation treatment

variable.name: ANATOMICTREATMENTSITE
variable.description: Describes radiation therapy administration in reference to location of disease
